channel.title: Talk on Katzenpost
channel.description: Recent content in Talk on Katzenpost

item.title: Katzenpost at 37C3
item.description: Dr. Eva Infeld and surveillance expert and developer Leif Ryge held a session at the Chaos Communication Congress about the current state of the project, some of the things we’re working on, and some of the pitfalls many anonymity systems fall into. Building an anonymity system fit for our dystopian age is a hard problem, but we’re doing it.
